'''Timid Morrow''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the commissions [[Food Delivery]] and [[Big Pudgy Problem!]], and the event [[Unreconciled Stars]].

==Location==
<gallery>
NPC Location Timid Morrow.png|Timid Morrow's location ([[Food Delivery]])
</gallery>

==Profile==
Morrow is a hunter from [[Springvale]]. He often hunts for boars but slimes would attack him preventing him from doing his job.
